text.p: These are the leading stories in the Moroccan press on Wednesday. Reuters has not verified these stories and does not vouch for their accuracy.
- King Hassan announces referendum over split of parliament into two chambers.
- Burkina Faso President Blaise Compaore on private visit to Morocco.
- King Hassan pardons 592 prisoners on day marking the 43th anniversary of the revolution of the king and the people.
- Fish exports registered strong progression in last decade.
- Moroccan coastguards arrest 17 illegal immigrants trying to reach Spain aboard makeshift boats.
